attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it illegal for under 18s to buy knives and bring tougher custodial sentences automatically on people carrying potentially harmful or deadly weapons, and tougher sentences on people using them.

Challenge youth culture to start to create a new future where kids recognise right from wrong. 

Act now to change the future before this vile disease spreads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
